# customWords

**Instance Property**

An array of strings to supplement the recognized languages at the word-recognition stage.

## Declaration

```swift
var customWords: [String] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Custom words take precedence over the standard lexicon. The request ignores this value if [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNRecognizeTextRequest/usesLanguageCorrection] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Specifying the Language

- **automaticallyDetectsLanguage**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to attempt detecting the language to use the appropriate model for recognition and language correction.
- **recognitionLanguages**: An array of languages to detect, in priority order.
- **usesLanguageCorrection**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request applies language correction during the recognition process.
- **supportedRecognitionLanguages()**: Returns the identifiers of the languages that the request supports.
- **supportedRecognitionLanguages(for:revision:)**: Requests a list of languages that the specified revision recognizes.
